oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt for taxes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a receipt for state and county taxes paid in Grainger County, Tennessee by Matlida Dotson. Matlida was the widow of David Dotson, a Confederate veteran from Grainger County. David M. Dotson served in Co. K, 37th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA and lost part of his foot at the Battle of Franklin, Tennessee on November 30, 1864. See also (davi108).
